meanings.definition: A plant with bright blue flowers and hairy leaves, often used in cooking and herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The borage in the garden has beautiful blue flowers.
meanings.sent2: I added some fresh borage leaves to the salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent3: The borage plant decided to wear a blue flower as a hat.
meanings.sent4: Herbal tea with borage is like a soothing hug for your insides.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue borage flowers danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The leaves or flowers of the borage plant, used as a garnish or in salads.
meanings.sent1: She sprinkled some chopped borage on top of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The borage flowers added a pop of color to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The borage leaves whispered to the lettuce, 'We make salads better.'
meanings.sent4: The borage garnish was like a tiny edible confetti on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The fresh scent of borage filled the kitchen as she prepared the salad.
